thread.section_title: Vital Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vital Choice | vitalchoice.com
thread.title: Brenda Peeden
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by Brenda Peeden

author: Brenda Peeden
title: Brenda Peeden
text:
Vital Choice is the absolute best company I've ever been associated with. Their products, customer service and desire to please are top of the line. After enjoying their products for many years, I hesitate to purchase seafood or any of their product line anywhere else. I am spoiled by Vital Choice.
Brenda Peeden
Greensboro, NC
